DataElement.preferredName: How Often Bothered by Problems Blurred Vision Occurrence Lee cGVHD Symptom Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The measurement of how often bothered by blurred vision based on the Lee cGVHD symptom scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: How Often Bothered by Problems Blurred Vision Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A question about how often an individual is or was bothered by problems._Blurred vision is the loss of visual acuity (sharpness of vision) resulting in a loss of ability to see small details. (from MedlinePlus Medical Encyclopedia)_An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: How Often Bothered by Problems Blurred Vision
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A question about how often an individual is or was bothered by problems.:Blurred vision is the loss of visual acuity (sharpness of vision) resulting in a loss of ability to see small details. (from MedlinePlus Medical Encyclopedia)

Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual is or was bothered by problems.
Blurred vision is the loss of visual acuity (sharpness of vision) resulting in a loss of ability to see small details. (from MedlinePlus Medical Encyclopedia)

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: . 2020-12-31 ak OK to release per KM.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A self-report questionnaire containing 30 items in 7 subscales (skin, eye, mouth, lung, nutrition, energy, and psychological), developed to measure symptoms of chronic graft-versus-host disease. Patients report their level of symptom bother on a 5-point Likert scale.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated definition to match NCIt. mc 9/8/20

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Lee Chronic Graft-versus-Host Disease Symptom Scale
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A self-report questionnaire containing 30 items in 7 subscales (skin, eye, mouth, lung, nutrition, energy, and psychological), developed to measure symptoms of chronic graft-versus-host disease. Patients report their level of symptom “bother” over the previous month on a 5-point Likert scale.

Concepts.longName: Lee Chronic Graft-versus-Host Disease Symptom Scale
Concepts.definition: A self-report questionnaire containing 30 items in 7 subscales (skin, eye, mouth, lung, nutrition, energy, and psychological), developed to measure symptoms of chronic graft-versus-host disease. Patients report their level of symptom bother on a 5-point Likert scale.
